projects.title: Full Stack Developer
projects.description: passionate about building scalable web applications and seamless user experiences. Skilled in React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and modern authentication tools. Experienced in integrating AI models and deploying full-stack projects. Always eager to learn & craft clean, efficient code.

projects.title: Software Developer Intern
projects.description: Computer Science student adept in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Hands-on experience in project setup, requirements analysis, and collaborating on development and testing. Eager to contribute and learn.

projects.title: Portfolio Project
projects.description: Passionate Web Developer skilled in crafting engaging and responsive user interfaces. Eager to contribute innovative solutions and evolve as a web developer.

projects.title: Real Estate Platform
projects.description: Developed a real estate web platform using React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, enabling users to list, search, and save properties with features like map-based search using Leaflet, real-time chat, and secure authentication with JWT.

projects.title: LILITH AI
projects.description: Lilith AI is a full-stack AI-powered chat application built with React, Express (Node.js), MongoDB Atlas, and Google Gemini AI, with Clerk authentication for secure login and signup.

projects.title: Pasmec
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive website for ”Pasmec,” a building construction company, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Focused on creating an attractive UI and showcasing the company’s services effectively.
